mapper.insert: insert into Lend(user_id, borrow_info_id, lend_no, title, amount, period, lend_year_rate, service_rate, return_method, lowest_amount, invest_amount, invest_num, publish_date, lend_start_date, lend_end_date, lend_info, expect_amount, real_amount, status, check_time, check_admin_id, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{userId}, #{borrowInfoId}, #{lendNo}, #{title}, #{amount}, #{period}, #{lendYearRate}, #{serviceRate}, #{returnMethod}, #{lowestAmount}, #{investAmount}, #{investNum}, #{publishDate}, #{lendStartDate}, #{lendEndDate}, #{lendInfo}, #{expectAmount}, #{realAmount}, #{status}, #{checkTime}, #{checkAdminId}, now(), 0)
